basics.label: Process Technology and Engineering Specialist
basics.summary: A dynamic, results-oriented, and highly talented in Process Technology and Engineering with a couple of years of experience consistently received high ratings for technical and chemical expertise. Expertise in a wide range of manufacturing processes and manufacturing control systems.
